thread.title: Kendall Jenner watched by famous friends as she walked for Balmain at Paris Fashion Week
thread.title_full: Kendall Jenner watched by famous friends as she walked for Balmain at Paris Fashion Week

title: Kendall Jenner watched by famous friends as she walked for Balmain at Paris Fashion Week
text:
Kendall Jenner watched by famous friends as she walked for Balmain at Paris Fashion Week Kendall Jenner watched by famous friends as she walked for Balmain at Paris Fashion Week 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Paris Fashion Week has been celebrity central this week – with Rihanna jetting in, Joe Jonas and Gigi Hadid putting in an appearance and Kendall Jenner strutting her stuff on the catwalk. 
Rihanna arrived at Charles de Gaulle airport in Paris in a baggy black hoody, shades and sandals. This didn’t make her any less conspicuously RiRi, of course. 
She later ramped up the style for a front row appearance, with a giant fur and leather coat. 
Meanwhile, Kendall Jenner stole the show at Balmain. Half-sister Kim Kardashian may have been the talk of the town last season after debuting a new blonde hairstyle, but this time it was Kendall’s turn. 
She modelled two looks – a space-age sixties jumpsuit, and a white geometric lattice dress. Kendall Jenner models for Balmain at Paris Fashion Week (Thibault Camus/AP) 
There were plenty of famous faces in the audience to watch the 19-year-old, who is one of the world’s top-paid models. 
Jada Pinkett Smith stunned with slicked-back hair and a cinched waist olive green Balmain sweater alongside a green mini-skirt. Jada Pinkett Smith at Paris Fashion Week (Zacharie Scheurer/AP) 
Joe Jonas and girlfriend Gigi Hadid kept a low profile, with Gigi in a perfect pony-tail and gold cardigan. Joe Jonas and Gigi Hadid at Paris Fashion Week (Zacharie Scheurer/AP) 
Balmain’s show featured the colours of the pigments of “ancient civilisations”– malachite green, golden sienna, Egyptian blue, and white — as well as suedes and jewels. 
Kris Jenner also appeared with boyfriend Corey Gamble to support her daughter on the runway – rocking a flowing striped number. Share article Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble (Zacharie Scheurer/AP) Promoted Stories
